item.title: Court Blocks Expedited Subpoenas to Identify Digital Pirates, Dealing Blow to Copyright Holders
item.description: An appeals court on Friday blocked studios and record labels from using expedited subpoenas to identify internet users suspected of illegally sharing songs, movies and TV shows. The 9th Circuit Court

item.title: Senators are trying to force ISPs to block all foreign pirate sites
item.description: Lawmakers have introduced a new bill aimed at countering “foreign piracy sites,” as reported earlier by TorrentFreak. The bill, called the Block Bad Electronic Art and Recording Distributors (Block BE
